title: Cayenne
summary: Cayenne (/keɪˈɛn/;[5] French pronunciation: [kajɛn] (listen)) is the capital city of French Guiana, an overseas region and department of France located in South America.  The city stands on a former island at the mouth of the Cayenne River on the Atlantic coast.  The city's motto is "fert aurum industria", which means "work brings wealth".[6]
